original_text: For the builders, every one had his sword girded by his side, and so builded. And he that sounded the trumpet was by me.
korean_text: 건축하는 자는 각각 허리에 칼을 차고 건축하며 나팔 부는 자는 내 곁에 섰었느니라

sentences.original_text: every one had his sword girded by his side
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람은 자신의 옆에 칼을 차고 있었고

sentences.original_text: And he that sounded the trumpet
